Name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
Star: Tom Holland, Zendaya, Benedict Cumberbatch, Jacob Batalon
Summary: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

Name: The Witcher
Star: Henry Cavill, Freya Allan, Anya Chalotra, Mimi Ndiweni
Summary: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

Name: Hawkeye
Star: Jeremy Renner, Hailee Steinfeld, Florence Pugh, Vera Farmiga
Summary: Series based on the Marvel Comics superhero Hawkeye, centering on the adventures of Young Avenger, Kate Bishop, who took on the role after the original Avenger, Clint Barton.

Name: The Wheel of Time
Star: Rosamund Pike, Daniel Henney, Madeleine Madden, Zoë Robins
Summary: Set in a high fantasy world where magic exists, but only some can access it, a woman named Moiraine crosses paths with five young men and women. This sparks a dangerous, world-spanning journey. Based on the book series by Robert Jordan.

Name: The Northman
Star: Alexander Skarsgård, Anya Taylor-Joy, Willem Dafoe, Nicole Kidman
Summary: From acclaimed director Robert Eggers, The Northman is an epic revenge thriller that explores how far a Viking prince will go to seek justice for his murdered father.

Name: The Lost City
Star: Sandra Bullock, Brad Pitt, Daniel Radcliffe, Channing Tatum
Summary: A reclusive romance novelist on a book tour with her cover model gets swept up in a kidnapping attempt that lands them both in a cutthroat jungle adventure.

Name: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
Star: Benedict Cumberbatch, Elizabeth Olsen, Rachel McAdams, Xochitl Gomez
Summary: Plot unknown. Sequel to the 2016 Marvel film 'Doctor Strange'.

Name: The King's Man
Star: Ralph Fiennes, Gemma Arterton, Rhys Ifans, Harris Dickinson
Summary: In the early years of the 20th century, the Kingsman agency is formed to stand against a cabal plotting a war to wipe out millions.

Name: Pushpa: The Rise - Part 1
Star: Allu Arjun, Fahadh Faasil, Rashmika Mandanna, Dhananjaya
Summary: Story of Pushpa Raj, a lorry driver in Seshachalam forests of South India, set in the backdrop of red sandalwood smuggling. Red Sandalwood is endemic to South-Eastern Ghats (mountain range) of India.

Name: Spider-Man
Star: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, James Franco
Summary: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.

Name: Station Eleven
Star: Joe Pingue, Mackenzie Davis, Himesh Patel, Matilda Lawler
Summary: A post apocalyptic saga spanning multiple timelines, telling the stories of survivors of a devastating flu as they attempt to rebuild and reimagine the world anew while holding on to the best of what's been lost.

Name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
Star: Tom Holland, Michael Keaton, Robert Downey Jr., Marisa Tomei
Summary: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

Name: Arcane
Star: Hailee Steinfeld, Kevin Alejandro, Jason Spisak, Harry Lloyd
Summary: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.

Name: Game of Thrones
Star: Emilia Clarke, Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington, Lena Headey
Summary: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

Name: Elf
Star: Will Ferrell, James Caan, Bob Newhart, Zooey Deschanel
Summary: Raised as an over-sized elf, a human travels from the North Pole to NYC to meet his biological father who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit.

Name: Dune
Star: Timothée Chalamet, Rebecca Ferguson, Zendaya, Oscar Isaac
Summary: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

Name: The Amazing Spider-Man
Star: Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Rhys Ifans, Irrfan Khan
Summary: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

Name: No Time to Die
Star: Daniel Craig, Ana de Armas, Rami Malek, Léa Seydoux
Summary: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

Name: Spider-Man: Far from Home
Star: Tom Holland, Samuel L. Jackson, Jake Gyllenhaal, Marisa Tomei
Summary: Following the events of Avengers: Endgame (2019), Spider-Man must step up to take on new threats in a world that has changed forever.

Name: Sing 2
Star: Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Scarlett Johansson, Tori Kelly
Summary: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.

Name: A Boy Called Christmas
Star: Maggie Smith, Isabella O'Sullivan, Joel Fry, Eden Lawrence
Summary: In this origin story of Father Christmas, an ordinary boy (with a loyal pet mouse and a reindeer at his side) sets out on an extraordinary adventure to find his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of Elfhelm.

Name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
Star: Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Jamie Foxx, Paul Giamatti
Summary: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

Name: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
Star: Tom Hardy, Woody Harrelson, Michelle Williams, Naomie Harris
Summary: Eddie Brock attempts to reignite his career by interviewing serial killer Cletus Kasady, who becomes the host of the symbiote Carnage and escapes prison after a failed execution.

Name: Spider-Man 3
Star: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Topher Grace, Thomas Haden Church
Summary: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

Name: Spider-Man 2
Star: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina, James Franco
Summary: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.

Name: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
Star: Simu Liu, Awkwafina, Tony Chiu-Wai Leung, Ben Kingsley
Summary: Shang-Chi, the master of weaponry-based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organization.

Name: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
Star: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, Catherine O'Hara
Summary: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

Name: The Grinch
Star: Benedict Cumberbatch, Cameron Seely, Rashida Jones, Pharrell Williams
Summary: A grumpy Grinch (Benedict Cumberbatch) plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.

Name: The Polar Express
Star: Tom Hanks, Chris Coppola, Michael Jeter, Leslie Zemeckis
Summary: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

Name: Eternals
Star: Gemma Chan, Richard Madden, Angelina Jolie, Salma Hayek
Summary: The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history and civilizations.

Name: Lost in Space
Star: Molly Parker, Toby Stephens, Maxwell Jenkins, Taylor Russell
Summary: After crash-landing on an alien planet, the Robinson family fight against all odds to survive and escape, but they're surrounded by hidden dangers.

Name: Avengers: Endgame
Star: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
Summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

Name: Ron's Gone Wrong
Director: Sarah Smith, Jean-Philippe Vine, Octavio E. Rodriguez
Star: Jack Dylan Grazer, Zach Galifianakis, Ed Helms, Olivia Colman
Summary: The story of Barney, an awkward middle-schooler and Ron, his new walking, talking, digitally-connected device. Ron's malfunctions set against the backdrop of the social media age launch them on a journey to learn about true friendship.

Name: Klaus
Star: Jason Schwartzman, J.K. Simmons, Rashida Jones, Will Sasso
Summary: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

Name: Titans
Star: Brenton Thwaites, Anna Diop, Ryan Potter, Teagan Croft
Summary: A team of young superheroes combat evil and other perils.

Name: The Mandalorian
Star: Pedro Pascal, Carl Weathers, Barry Lowin, Gina Carano
Summary: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

Name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Director: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman
Star: Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld, Mahershala Ali
Summary: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Star: Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Richard Harris, Maggie Smith
Summary: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

Name: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
Star: Alison Sudol, Mads Mikkelsen, Jude Law, Katherine Waterston
Summary: The third installment of the 'Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them' series which follows the adventures of Newt Scamander.

Name: Star Trek: Discovery
Star: Sonequa Martin-Green, Doug Jones, Anthony Rapp, Mary Wiseman
Summary: Ten years before Kirk, Spock, and the Enterprise, the USS Discovery discovers new worlds and lifeforms as one Starfleet officer learns to understand all things alien.

Name: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
Star: Carrie Coon, Paul Rudd, Finn Wolfhard, Mckenna Grace
Summary: When a single mom and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind.

Name: Uncharted
Star: Tom Holland, Mark Wahlberg, Sophia Ali, Antonio Banderas
Summary: The story is a prequel to the games, starring Holland as a younger Drake, showing us details of how he came to meet and befriend Sully.

Name: Jingle All the Way
Star: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sinbad, Phil Hartman, Rita Wilson
Summary: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out of them, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

Name: Doctor Who
Star: Jodie Whittaker, Peter Capaldi, Pearl Mackie, Matt Smith
Summary: The further adventures in time and space of the alien adventurer known as the Doctor and their companions from planet Earth.

Name: Black Widow
Star: Scarlett Johansson, Florence Pugh, David Harbour, Rachel Weisz
Summary: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.

Name: Free Guy
Star: Ryan Reynolds, Jodie Comer, Taika Waititi, Lil Rel Howery
Summary: A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open world video game.

Name: Vikings
Star: Katheryn Winnick, Gustaf Skarsgård, Alexander Ludwig, Georgia Hirst
Summary: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore - and raid - the distant shores across the ocean.

Name: The Christmas Chronicles
Star: Kurt Russell, Darby Camp, Judah Lewis, Oliver Hudson
Summary: The story of sister and brother, Kate and Teddy Pierce, whose Christmas Eve plan to catch Santa Claus on camera turns into an unexpected journey that most kids could only dream about.

Name: Back to the Outback
Star: Guy Pearce, Jacki Weaver, Isla Fisher, Eric Bana
Summary: Tired of being locked in a reptile house where humans gawk at them like they're monsters, a group of Australia's deadliest creatures plot a daring escape from their zoo to the Outback.

Name: Loki
Star: Tom Hiddleston, Owen Wilson, Gugu Mbatha-Raw, Sophia Di Martino
Summary: The mercurial villain Loki resumes his role as the God of Mischief in a new series that takes place after the events of “Avengers: Endgame.”
